attributes.action: Introduce steam engines back onto mainline railways.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
this petition is set up to raise awearness of how important steam engine were and still are.

steam is one of the things that interested many school boys in the old days. and gave them somthing good to see and do.

the activity of getting up early, and accually working is good, driving these days is lazy, you sit in a chair moving a lever, but with steam engines your moving all the time, being awear, and active. 



steam engines are still used in places such as china, which must show that it is more eficiant that diesel.

also, there is more coal than oil, so the solution is, to switch to coal, electricity is a possability, but how is that electricty produced, from nuclear power stations, which can be very dangerous, they emit radiation, and if one was to blow up, such as  Chernobyl.

somewhere, it was said that if the design of steam was worked on, then it would be as efficiant as diesel.
such as the Bulleid Leader.

so pleaese help bring back the age of steam.
